options.name: Legend of the Black King
options.description: +1 Arm and Aegis (4+).

options.name: Black Standard of Zagvozd
options.description: Melee Attacks made by Rank-and-File model parts without Mount in the bearer's unit gains +1 to hit.

options.name: Reaper's Harvest
options.description: Str is set to 10, AP is set to 10, Divine Attacks. When rolling to wound use the enemy's Courage instead of its Resilience.

options.name: True Thirst
options.description: +1 Str, +1 AP, Unholy Appetite, Vampiric(3+). If the wielder's model has Height 4 or more, the attacks gain Vampiric(5+) instead of Vampiric(3+).

options.name: Necromantic Staff
options.description: The bearer gains Channel (1) and can cast Arise! (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell (5+), with the following changes : its Range is 6", and it has type Aura.

options.name: Hypnotic Pendant
options.description: The bearer gains Parry. All Rank-and-File models with Height 2 or less in the bearer's unit gain Parry.

options.name: Eternity Gem
options.description: The bearer's model gains Immune (Lethal Strike, Poison Attacks, Multiple Wounds (X)).

options.name: Night's Crown
options.description: Attacks towards the bearer suffer -1 to wound.

options.name: Cursed Medallion
options.description: During Pre-game Selections choose a Character, or a single model unit on the opponent's Army List. The bearer must reroll failed to-hit and to-wound rolls against the chosen model.

options.name: Elixir of Death
options.description: The bearer's model gains Ghost Step,Ghostly Form. The model cannot join Rank-and-File units with Ghostly Form.

options.name: Lahmia
options.description: The bearer's Arm is set to 1, it loses Metal Armour and gains Distracting (1, if Height 1--4), Elven Finesse.

options.name: Strigoi
options.description: The bearer's Arm is set to 0 and its HP are set to 4, it loses Metal Armour and gains First Strike (Hatred). If taken on a model on foot, it gains Fortitude (4+).

options.name: Sangreal
options.description: The model part gains +1 Arm and Fury.

options.name: Vetala
options.description: The model gains Vampiric(4+), Disciplined, Awaken(Bat Swarms, Dire Wolves, Great Bats, Zombies). The bearer's unit gains Autonomous.

options.name: Blood Magic
options.description: The first time each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice for this Casting Roll. If this option is used, the bearer chooses a Character in its unit to lose 1 HP.

options.name: Ghoul Lord
options.description: The bearer and all Rank-and-File models in the bearer's unit gains Poison Attacks.

options.name: Commandment
options.description: The Def and Off of Rank-and-File models in the bearer's unit are set to 6.

options.name: Crimson Rage
options.description: The model part gains Hatred, and its Vampiric rolls are Maximised.

options.name: Storm Caller
options.description: All units within 12" of the bearer gains Hard Target (1).

options.name: Arcane Knowledge
options.description: Learned Spells cast by the model gains +6" Range. Aura Spells gain +3" Range instead.

options.name: Eternal Duellist
options.description: The bearer's Melee Attacks ignore Parry, and must reroll natural to-hit and to-wound rolls of ‘1’.

options.name: Monster Hunter
options.description: The model part gains Multiple Wounds (2, towards Height 4--5).

options.name: Flying Horror
options.description: The model gains Fly, Swiftstride, +2" Cha and +2" Mob.

options.name: Unbreakable Will
options.description: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, select a single friendly unit Engaged in the same Combat as the bearer (this can be its own unit). This unit gains Stubborn until the end of the Player Turn.

options.name: Bestial Bulk
options.description: The model's Height is set to 3, and its base size to 40×40mm. The model gains Stomp Attacks (1), Attached (Ghasts, Vampire Spawn).

options.name: Mesmerising Gaze
options.description:
The model must issue a Duel whenever possible. This cannot be prevented by issuing a Duel with another firendly model first. This Duel must, if possible, be accepted. When this model is a Duellist, it gains Distracting (1, against non-Duellists*).
* i.e. enemy models that ar not part of the duel.

options.name: Mysteries of the Night
options.description: The model's Path Access is replaced with Shamanism, Witchcraft.

options.name: General, Disciplined and The Dead Arise
